details.arabic_diacless: بسم اللٰه واللٰه أكبر [اللٰهم منك ولك] اللٰهم تقبل مني
details.arabic: بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ وَاللّٰهُ أَكْبَرُ [اَللّٰهُمَّ مِنْكَ وَلَكَ] اَللّٰهُمَّ تَقَبَّلْ مِنِّيْ
details.transliteration: Bismillaahi wallaahu 'Akbar [Allaahumma minka wa laka] Allaahumma taqabbal minnee.
details.translations: With the Name of Allah, Allah is the Most Great! [O Allah, from You and to You.] O Allah, accept it from me.
details.reference: At-Tirmithi 5/82, Ahmad 4/400, Abu Dawud 4/ 308. See also Al-Albani, Sahih At-Tirmithi 2/354.
